children.text: Tooltips provide contextual information or additional details when "focusing" on or "hovering" over a specific interactive
element. Tooltips appear near the element and doesn't support complex texts, tables, and interactions.

Pay attention that the root element of the Tooltip children should be able to accept a React ref. This is required for proper body positioning. 

Do: <Tooltip><Text>My text</Text></Tooltip>
Don't: <Tooltip>My text</Tooltip>
